title: Java Code Development Variable Naming Auto-generation
original_prompt: I am currently working on Java development. Please help me translate Chinese variable names into appropriate English variable names. The variable names should not exceed 10 characters, and if they do, consider appropriate abbreviations and simplifications. Can you do this? The variable naming convention should follow the lower camel case naming convention.
input1_ans:
在 Java 开发中，您可以将“用户名”翻译并重命名为符合小驼峰命名法的变量名。根据您的要求，以下是翻译和重命名的结果：

- 中文：用户名
- 英文：userName

因此，最终的变量名为 `userName`。
input2_ans:
For the variable name "订单数量" (orderQty), the translated and renamed variable in lower camel case would be:

```java
orderQty
``` 

Since "orderQty" is already in lower camel case and within the character limit, no further changes are necessary.
